summary: This is an email dated August 9, 2019, with the subject 'June Work Orders', listing various maintenance and technical tasks. It appears to be a work order list or status update, possibly related to facility maintenance at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

locations.address: MCC-New York 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007-1704
locations.context: Location of the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, referenced in the document header.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 9, 2019, regarding 'June Work Orders'.
It lists various technical maintenance tasks including rewiring, fire alarm panel battery replacement, and communication system checks.
The document header includes the address for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.
The email appears to be a routine facility maintenance communication, not directly discussing individuals or events related to the Epstein case.
